tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE contract_parameters (
    parameter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    parameter_name TEXT,
    parameter_value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_configurations (
    config_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    config_name TEXT,
    config_value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_parameters (
    parameter_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id),
    parameter_name STRING,
    parameter_type STRING,
    parameter_value TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_address VARCHAR(255),
    creator_address VARCHAR(255),
    creation_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE contract_parameters (
    parameter_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id),
    parameter_name VARCHAR(255),
    parameter_value TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE contract_events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id),
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date TIMESTAMP,
    event_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE contract_permissions (
    permission_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id),
    permission_type VARCHAR(50),
    permission_granted BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE contract_logs (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id),
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT
)
